SCTX:
begin fab_attack_highord

;guards during the attack

short state
short journalOnce

if state == -1
	return
endif

if ( FabAttack == 1 )
	if ( getjournalindex "tr_mhattack" < 30 )	
		if ( GetDistance, Player < 300 )
			if ( saydone == 1 )
				Say "vo\misc\tr_highord_4.mp3" , "Take arms! Drive back these creatures!!!"
				if ( journalOnce == 0 )
					journal "tr_mhattack" 25
					set journalOnce to -1
				endif
				set state to -1
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif

end
